li.label: Witch Hunter Apprentice
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has been recently inducted into the Witch Hunter cadre, and is still in training.

li.label: Witch Hunter Templar
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has learned the basic of being a Witch Hunter, but has little real world experience on the job.

li.label: Witch Hunter Captain
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has been a Witch Hunter for a handful of years, but still has things to learn.

li.label: Witch Hunter General
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a high level Witch Hunter, one of the best.

li.label: Sigmar Initiate
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has found that they have been noticed by the god Sigmar.

li.label: Sigmar Blessed
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has been blessed by Sigmar, and can leverage some of the god's power.

li.label: Sigmar Illustrious
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has been gifted by Sigmar with the ability to harness a medium amount of the god's power.

li.label: Sigmar Exalted
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is truly one of the most gifted prophets of Sigmar.

li.label: Shallya Initiate
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has found that they have been noticed by the god Shallya.

li.label: Shallya Blessed
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has been blessed by Shallya, and can leverage some of the god's power.

li.label: Shallya Illustrious
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has been gifted by Shallya with the ability to harness a medium amount of the god's power.

li.label: Shallya Exalted
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is truly one of the most gifted prophets of Shallya.

li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is truly one of the most gifted prophets of Ulric.

li.label: Lore of Beasts Initiate
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] Is completely new to magic, but clearly has inate talent.

li.label: Lore of Beasts Mage
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] Has begun the journey to becoming a proper Lore of Beasts wizard.

li.label: Lore of Beasts Wizard
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a proper wizard, well skilled and experienced with the Lore of Beasts.

li.label: Lore of Beasts Warlock
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is among the most respected of Lore of Beasts magic users. Extremely skilled, and powerful.

li.label: Lore of Beasts Master
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is ranked among the elite of magic users with the Lore of Beasts. Truly a master of the lore.

li.label: Plague Lore Initiate
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] Is completely new to magic, but clearly has inate talent.

li.label: Plague Lore Mage
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] Has begun the journey to becoming a proper Plague Lore seer.

li.label: Plague Lore Seer
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a proper seer, well skilled and experienced with the Plague Lore.

li.label: Gut Magic Initiate
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] Is completely new to magic, but clearly has inate talent for the Lore of the Great Maw.

li.label: Gut Magic Butcher
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] Has begun learning the ins and outs of gut magic, and is working on honing the skills required to use the Lore of the Great Maw.

li.label: Gut Magic High Butcher
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a proper butcher, a user of the Lore of the Great Maw. Being well skilled and experienced in the Lore, [PAWN_nameDef] is held in high esteem by ogres.

li.label: Gut Magic Great Butcher
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is among the most revered of users of the Lore of the Great Maw. Extremely skilled, and powerful.

li.label: Gut Magic Slaughtermaster
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is at the top of the Gut Magic skill level, being considered a proper Slaughtermaster. Truly a master of the Lore of the Great Maw.
